title: Development of dual-channel fluorescent mesoporous SiO2 nanosphere-coated yttrium aluminum garnet composites for sensitive detection of latent fingerprints
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9529-9537
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00676C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ping Yang, Tingfei Shi, Shuangquan Zhu, Kuiliang Li, Hong Zhao
In this study, we investigated the detection of latent fingerprints (LFPs) using green light- and near-infrared (NIR) light-induced up/down-conversion dual-channel composites.
